summary: Comedy troupe The Yes Men stage phony events and press releases in an effort to bring attention to environmental dangers and corporate greed.
cast: Mike Bonanno|Andy Bichlbaum|Benadette Chandia Kodili|Albert Mwesigwa|Gitz Crazyboy|Laurel Whitney|Ivan Vamos|Rita Vamos|Caz|Sal Salamone|Mike Mathieu|Dorli Rainey|Sean Devlin|Leonid Vlasov|Ilya Kuznetsov|Bill McKibben|Barbara Alexander|Tito Ybarra|Larry Wilske|Roosevelt Mercer|Anomie Belle|Anthon Smith|Paul Horiuchi|Bhama Roget|Wil Van Egmond|Eric Wohlschlegel|Hillary Clinton|Al Gore|Benito Mussolini|Barack Obama|Vladimir Putin
director: Directors: Andy Bichlbaum (as The Yes Men), Mike Bonanno (as The Yes Men) | 1 more credit Â»
title: The Yes Men Are Revolting
